attributes.action: Reinstate the £150 warm home scheme for people suffering with disabilities PIP
attributes.additional_details: Give them back the money, with the cost of living crisis everyone is struggling and those more vulnerable such as the mental or physically disabled. Shouldn’t be loosing money down to ill health. We should be more protected and respected as human beans and we are not been heard!
attributes.background: Reinstate the £150 to disabled households as part the warm home discount, those who are claiming PIP for mental and physical disabilities are more vulnerable and more likely to struggle during the cold, it’s proven that cold weather has negative impacts on physical and mental health.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628877
